content: nature inspiration glorious colours vanilla st r ipy socks by caroline sommerfeld one of my favourite comfort knits is a simple sock that lets the yarn do the talking hand dyed yarns can do so many fun things in socks that sometimes we don t want to talk over them with fancy stitches it s also fun to mix it up a little with colour and i love to make simple stripy socks perfect for using up mini skeins or yarn ends this pattern is written just for those two goals simple but super fun to make socks ancient arts yarns ancient arts fibre crafts socknado 80% sw merino/20% nylon 100g/3 5oz 350m/385yd 1 skein or 6 20 gram mini skeins of socknado sample shown in painter series using 5-10 grams of 18 colours ancientartsfibre com © caroline sommerfeld 2024 1 vanilla st r ipy socks sizes stitches and abbreviations adult xs s m l xl 2xl k knit finished measurements k2tog knit two together stretches to fit 17 -
